user_instruction: 'Send an email to TechSolutions Inc. (contact@tech.solution) with insights on our hiring process. You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request to Share Hiring-Process Insights with TechSolutions Inc.

Hi [Recipient Name],

I hope you’re doing well. Could you please draft and send an email to TechSolutions Inc. (contact@tech.solution) that summarizes Hamilton University’s assistantship hiring process?

Feel free to pull any relevant details, timelines, forms, or policy notes from John’s Gmail and the “HR – Hiring Process” pages in Notion. A concise overview highlighting each major step—application, screening, interview, selection, and onboarding—would be ideal. If possible, please include links or attachments to key documents so TechSolutions’ development team can reference them while designing the new student management system.

Let me know if you have any questions or run into difficulty locating the material. Thanks in advance for your help!

Best regards,  
[Your Name]

final_output:
